Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.1: Now after the wall was built, and I had set up the doors, and numbered the porters and singing men, and Levites:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.2: I commanded Hanani my brother, and Hananias ruler of the house of Jerusalem, (for he seemed as a sincere man, and one that feared God above the rest,)
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.3: And I said to them: Let not the gates of Jerusalem be opened till the sun be hot. And while they were yet standing by, the gates were shut, and barred: and I set watchmen of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, every one by their courses, and every man over against his house.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.4: And the city was very wide and great, and the people few in the midst thereof, and the houses were not built.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.5: But God had put in my heart, and I assembled the princes and magistrates, and common people, to number them: and I found a book of the number of them who came up at first, and therein it was found written:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.6: These are the children of the province, who came up from the captivity of them that had been carried away, whom Nabuchodonosor the king of Babylon had carried away, and who returned into Judea, every one into his own city.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.7: Who came with Zorobabel, Josue, Nehemias, Azarias, Raamias, Nahamani, Mardochai, Belsam, Mespharath, Begoia, Nahum, Baana. The number of the men of the people of Israel:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.8: The children of Pharos, two thousand one hundred seventy-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.9: The children of Sephatia, three hundred seventy-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.10: The children of Area, six hundred fifty-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.11: The children of Phahath Moab of the children of Josue and Joab, two thousand eight hundred eighteen.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.12: The children of Elam, one thousand two hundred fifty-four.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.13: The children of Zethua, eight hundred forty-five.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.14: The children of Zachai, seven hundred sixty.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.15: The children of Bannui, six hundred forty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.16: The children of Bebai, six hundred twenty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.17: The children of Azgad, two thousand three hundred twenty-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.18: The children of Adonicam, six hundred sixty-seven.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.19: The children of Beguai, two thousand sixty-seven.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.20: The children of Adin, six hundred fifty-five.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.21: The children of Ater, children of Hezechias, ninety-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.22: The children of Hasem, three hundred twenty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.23: The children of Besai, three hundred twenty-four.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.24: The children of Hareph, a hundred and twelve.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.26: The children of Bethlehem, and Netupha, a hundred eighty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.27: The men of Anathoth, a hundred twenty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.29: The men of Cariathiarim, Cephira, and Beroth, seven hundred forty-three.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.30: The men of Rama and Geba, six hundred twenty-one.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.31: The men of Machmas, a hundred twenty-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.32: The men of Bethel and Hai, a hundred twenty-three.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.33: The men of the other Nebo, fifty-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.34: The men of the other Elam, one thousand two hundred fifty-four.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.35: The children of Harem, three hundred and twenty.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.36: The children of Jericho, three hundred forty-five.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.37: The children of Led, of Hadid and One, seven hundred twenty-one.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.38: The children of Senaa, three thousand nine hundred thirty.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.39: The priests: the children of Idaia in the house of Josue, nine hundred and seventy-three.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.40: The children of Emmer, one thousand fifty-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.41: The children of Phashur, one thousand two hundred forty-seven.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.42: The children of Arem, one thousand and seventeen. The Levites:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.43: The children of Josue and Cedmihel, the sons
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.44: Of Oduia, seventy-four. The singing men:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.45: The children of Asaph, a hundred forty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.46: The porters: the children of Sellum, the children of Ater, the children of Telmon, the children of Accub, the children of Hatita, the children of Sobai: a hundred thirty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.47: The Nathinites: the children of Soha, the children of Hasupha, the children of Tebbaoth,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.48: The children of Ceros, the children of Siaa, the children of Phadon, the children of Lebana, the children of Hagaba, the children of Selmai,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.49: The children of Hanan, the children of Geddel, the children of Gaher,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.50: The children of Raaia, the children of Rasin, the children of Necoda,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.51: The children of Gezem, the children of Asa, the children of Phasea,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.52: The children of Besai, the children of Munim, the children of Nephussim,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.53: The children of Bacbuc, the children of Hacupha, the children of Harhur,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.54: The children of Besloth, the children of Mahida, the children of Harsa,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.55: The children of Bercos, the children of Sisara, the children of Thema,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.56: The children of Nasia, the children of Hatipha,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.57: The children of the servants of Solomon, the children of Sothai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Pharida,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.58: The children of Jahala, the children of Darcon, the children of Jeddel,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.59: The children of Saphatia, the children of Hatil, the children of Phochereth, who was born of Sabaim, the son of Amon.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.60: All the Nathinites, and the children of the servants of Solomon, three hundred ninety-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.61: And these are they that came up from Telmela, Thelharsa, Cherub, Addon, and Emmer: and could not shew the house of their fathers, nor their seed, whether they were of Israel.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.62: The children of Dalaia, the children of Tobia, the children of Necoda, six hundred forty-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.63: And of the priests, the children of Habia, the children of Accos, the children of Berzellai, who took a wife of the daughters of Berzellai the Galaadite, and he was called by their name.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.64: These sought their writing in the record, and found it not: and they were cast out of the priesthood.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.65: And Athersatha said to them, that they should not eat of the holies of holies, until there stood up a priest learned and skillful.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.66: All the multitude as it were one man, forty-two thousand three hundred sixty,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.67: Beside their menservants and womenservants, who were seven thousand three hundred thirty-seven: and among them singing men, and singing women, two hundred forty-five.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.68: Their horses, seven hundred thirty-six: their mules two hundred forty-five:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.69: Their camels, four hundred thirty-five, their asses, six thousand seven hundred and twenty.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.70: And some of the heads of the families gave unto the work. <u>Athersatha</u> gave into the treasure a thousand drama of gold, fifty bowls, and five hundred and thirty garments for priests.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.71: And some of the heads of families gave to the treasure of the work, twenty thousand drama of gold, and two thousand two hundred pounds of silver.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.72: And that which the rest of the people gave, was twenty thousand drama of gold, and two thousand pounds of silver, and sixty-seven garments for priests.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__07.73: And the priests, and the Levites, and the porters, and the singing men, and the rest of the common people, and the Nathinites, and all Israel dwelt in their cities.
